mapper.select: SELECT board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent, COUNT(comment.cno) AS comment_count FROM board LEFT JOIN comment ON board.bno = comment.bno WHERE board.btype = 0 GROUP BY board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent ORDER BY board.bno DESC;
SELECT board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent, board.bdate, board.bcalldibs, member.mno FROM board LEFT JOIN member ON board.mno = member.mno WHERE board.bno = #{bno};

SELECT comment.hno, comment.dno, comment.cno, comment.cdate, comment.ccontent FROM comment LEFT JOIN board ON comment.bno = board.bno WHERE board.bno = #{bno} AND comment.dno IS NOT NULL GROUP BY comment.hno, comment.dno, comment.cdate, comment.ccontent ORDER BY comment.cno DESC;

SELECT dv.dname, dv.dimg, dv.dinfo, dv.dpkind, dv.dcareer, dv.hno, dv.reviewAverage, hv.hname, hv.hospitalDepartments FROM doctorinfo_view dv INNER JOIN hospitalinfo_view hv ON dv.hno = hv.hno WHERE dv.dno IN #{dno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (btitle, bcontent, bdate, btype, mno) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bdate}, #{btype}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(cno) FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (bno, dno, hno, ccontent, cdate) VALUES (#{bno}, #{dno}, #{hno}, #{ccontent}, #{cdate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno} AND cno = #{cno}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET bcalldibs = CASE WHEN bcalldibs IS NULL THEN #{mno} ELSE CONCAT(bcalldibs, ',', #{mno}) END WHERE bno=#{bno}

UPDATE board SET bcalldibs = CASE WHEN CONCAT(',', bcalldibs, ',') LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{mno}, ',%') THEN TRIM(BOTH ',' FROM REPLACE(CONCAT(',', bcalldibs, ','), CONCAT(',', #{mno}, ','), ',')) ELSE bcalldibs END WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rpno) FROM report WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rpreporterno = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (rpreporterno, bno, rpcontent, rpurl, rpdate, mno) VALUES (#{mno}, #{bno}, #{rpcontent}, #{rpurl}, #{rpdate}, (SELECT mno FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}))
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM board b WHERE b.btitle LIKE CONCAT('%', '${searchWord}', '%') OR b.bcontent LIKE CONCAT('%', '${searchWord}', '%') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM comment c WHERE c.bno = b.bno AND c.ccontent LIKE CONCAT('%', '${searchWord}', '%'));
